messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Non-substantial??
messages.msgSnippet: Now I am REALLY outraged!  :) Commas and grammar are not insubstantial. Priorities, my dear! Geesh . . . Nance In a message dated 01/27/2002 12:57:07 AM
messages.messageBody:
Now I am REALLY outraged! :)

Commas and grammar are not insubstantial.

Priorities, my dear!

Geesh . . .

Nance


In a message dated 01/27/2002 12:57:07 AM !!!First Boot!!!,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Then the word 'and' replaced the comma:
> -I have a blue, red, yellow and green book.
>
> Unless it was a combination such as:
> -This morning I had coffee, ham and eggs, and toast.
>
> Then I saw some grammar police on Oprah one day and he said its:
> -I have a blue, red, yellow, and green book.
>
> The core of my beleif system was shaken!!! I was outraged!!!!
>
>
> Laughingly though, I guess things change so much eventually everyone will
> have their own rules. And I'll still have my pet peeves.
>
> thanks for the chat on non-substantial issues.
>
>
> kolleen
>
